author: undetermined
full_text:
I apologize, but this appears to be a CAPTCHA verification page, which contains no actual fact-check content. It seems to be a spam prevention mechanism displayed before accessing web content. There is no fact-check article to extract in this HTML snippet.

The page contains:
- A CAPTCHA image
- An audio CAPTCHA option
- An input field for entering the CAPTCHA code
- A submit button
- A support ID number

Would you like to try providing the actual fact-check HTML content again?
title: No, there is no such order by the RBI. FAQ on the RBI website regarding the demonetised currency clearly states that the grace period of exchanging the devalued notes for Indian citizens ended on March 31, 2017, and for non-resident Indians, it ended on June 30, 2017.
vclaim: This input contains no fact-check content, as it is merely a CAPTCHA verification page used for spam prevention.
